keyToStrMap.Full:
Warren the Weatherman

Occupation:
[] Weatherman (previously worked for the FBI)

Likes:
[] Looking for crop circles, sunshine

Dislikes:
[] Stormy weather, getting wet

Favourite quote:
[] Lightening never strikes twice in the same place

Favourite people in the (living) world:
[] My best friend Daisy

How I came to be here:
[] Struck by lightening

What I wish:
[] To invent an invisible umbrella that never blows inside out.
